cards.name: mixue-snow-king
facts: Dogs were domesticated from wolves thousands of years ago.
A dog’s sense of smell can be far stronger than a human.
Dogs communicate using body language, vocal sounds, and scent.

cards.name: Cat
facts: Cats sleep an average of 12 to 16 hours per day.
A cat’s whiskers help it judge tight spaces.
